verbs.description: stagnate (third-person singular simple present stagnates, present participle stagnating, simple past and past participle stagnated)

definitionGroups.group: To cease motion, activity, or progress:

entries.meaning: (of water, air, etc) To cease to flow or run.
examples: If the water stagnates, algae will grow.

entries.meaning: (of water, air, etc) To be or become foul from standing.
examples: Air stagnates in a closed room.

entries.meaning: To cease to develop, advance, or change; to become idle.
examples: Ready-witted tenderness  [â€¦]  never stagnates in vain lamentations while there is any room for hope.
